educationData.degree: Computer Science Expert ‚Äì Software Development (IHK Hamburg)
highlights: Successfully completed the final examination for the accredited profession of Computer Science Expert, specializing in Software Development.
Training focused on planning, developing, and implementing software projects with modern technologies.
Gained strong knowledge in programming, database management, and software architecture.
Qualification corresponds to Level 4 of the German and European Qualifications Framework.
Completed a mandatory internship as part of the vocational training for Application Development (IHK Hamburg).
Developed and maintained responsive user interfaces using React.js and TailwindCSS.
Implemented backend services with Node.js and Express for seamless API integration.
Designed and managed relational database structures with MySQL and MongoDB.

Developed a dance school reservation app (Final IHK Project) using the MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) featuring user login, form validation, dynamic course management, and automated email notifications.
Built the K√ºhlschrank App using the MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) ‚Äì a web app for managing food and drinks for employees, including an automatic ‚Ç¨30 monthly credit system.
Focus: Full-Stack Application Development with modern web technologies
Software Development: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (Basic to Advanced), React.js, PHP (with Databases, Performance & Security)
Object-Oriented Programming and UML ‚Äì Unified Modeling Language
Backend, Databases & Cloud: Relational Databases / SQL, Cloud Computing Fundamentals, AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner (Certified)
Agile Methods & Project Management: Scrum Methodology, Certified Scrum Master, Planning and Implementation of Software Projects
Programming & Certifications: Associate in Python Programming (Basic & Advanced), OCFA Java Foundations (Basic & Advanced), AWS Cloud Practitioner ‚Äì Certification Achieved
Business & Communication: Business Processes, Economics & Labor Law, Presentation and Job Application Techniques

WhyChoose.title: End-to-End Development
WhyChoose.context: Experienced in both frontend and backend, I build complete, scalable, and high-performance applications from concept to deployment.

WhyChoose.title: Modern & Versatile Tech Stack
WhyChoose.context: Proficient in the MERN stack, RESTful APIs, and Spring Boot ‚Äî delivering solutions that scale from startups to enterprise level.

WhyChoose.title: Clean & Maintainable Code
WhyChoose.context: Writing well-structured, efficient, and maintainable code that ensures long-term stability and scalability.

projects.name: Aziz Coffee Admin
projects.description: A full-stack coffee shop web app featuring menu management, table reservations, and an admin dashboard built with the MERN stack and TailwindCSS.

projects.name: Bakoo Restaurant
projects.description: A restaurant booking system using the MERN stack and Nodemailer for automated email confirmations. Designed with a clean and responsive TailwindCSS interface.

projects.description: A full-stack MERN application showcasing company services, featuring a responsive design, Nodemailer integration, and optimized backend performance.

projects.name: Aziz Portfolio
projects.description: My personal developer portfolio built with React, Node.js, and TailwindCSS ‚Äî highlighting my projects, experience, and technical skills in a modern responsive design.
